name: Supply Drops for Black Ops 3
description:
The Bo3 Supply Drop Simulator provides:
- The most realistic simulation / representation of Supply Drop Opening
- All Supply Drop Cards
- Supply Drop Card Inventory
- Desgin and Drop chances are similar to the real system
- Easy to Use
- Crypto-Keys Clicker system
- Real Betting system to gain Crypto-Keys
- Leaderboards and Achievements

Don't wait any longer! Download, click and start opening!

Notice: Drops cannot be transferred to your real account in any way!
